issue.title: [CF 1190] "Resource Display" not working with Runes
issue.body:
The "resourse display icon" is not tracking runes,combo points etc. of any unit, only the primary resource like mana,energie...
Is it possible to fix it,or cant tmw handle these kind of resources
Im using TMW version 7.4.0


> Posted by CurseForge user Mindfork | Imported from CurseForge issue #1190 | Raw

comments.body:
You can't track other people's runes or combo points. This has never been possible.

It was a mistake that runes was ever an option there. I'll go ahead and remove it.

The combo point tracking works fine on yourself, which is the only unit that it is possible to watch for combo points on.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
